game_subtitle: Curate the Office, Avoid the Burnout.

menu.new_game_confirm: Starting a new hire retires the current Executive. Only unlocked Perks are preserved. Are you sure?
menu.reset_save_confirm: This will permanently delete all your progress, including unlocked Perks and Executive performance history. Are you absolutely sure?

global.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred while loading game data.
global.quit_confirm: Are you sure you want to return to the main menu? Your progress will be saved.

run_ended_screen.run_complete: The Executive's Work Day is over.
run_ended_screen.adventurer_considers_fate: The Executive considers their career trajectory
run_ended_screen.continue_decision: Paradigm shifted! They're ready for another day!
run_ended_screen.retire_decision: They lost motivation, and filed their resignation after {run} Work Days.

choice_panel.title: Present Corporate Assets for the Executive to Choose From
choice_panel.title_room: Choose Three Rooms or One Department Head
choice_panel.roll_credits: No more floors. Time for the after-work party.

workshop.title: The Corporate Supply Closet
workshop.description: Spend Expense Account Funds to add more assets to your inventory catalog.
workshop.no_new_items: No new assets available for requisition this time.

game_engine.new_adventurer: A new Executive hire starts their day at office!
game_engine.adventurer_returns: The Executive returns for another Work Day!
game_engine.adventurer_declines_offer: Disappointed by your offers, they decide to take nothing.
game_engine.adventurer_drinks_potion: Sensing a threat to productivity, they urgently consumed the {potionName}.
game_engine.easy_fight: An easy meeting. Too trivial for synergy...
game_engine.great_battle: A productive negotiation! Quarterly results look excellent!
game_engine.too_close_for_comfort: That was a close call. Almost needed to call HR.
game_engine.adventurer_fell: The Executive suffered a fatal burnout on Floor {room} of Work Day {run}.
game_engine.adventurer_bored: The Executive became lethargic on Floor {room} of Work Day {run}, and quit.
game_engine.adventurer_apathy: The Executive started quiet quitting on Floor {room} of Work Day {run}, and left the company.
game_engine.empty_hand: The Executive waits for your decision, unaware that the budget has been frozen.
game_engine.welcome_to_workshop: Welcome back. Spend your Expense Funds wisely.
game_engine.healing_room: The Executive found the {name} and recovered {healing} stamina.
game_engine.trap_room: The Executive ran into the {name} and lost {damage} stamina.
game_engine.no_more_rooms: The Executive reached the end of the floor plan (without a performance review).

workshop.title: The Corporate Supply Closet
workshop.description: Between Work Days, you can now visit the Supply Closet and spend Expense Funds to add new assets to your inventory catalog (until the Executive resigns).

room_deck_size_increase.title: Office Expansion Approved
room_deck_size_increase.description: The number of rooms in your building has been increased to 36.

hand_size_increase.title: Rolodex Upgrade
hand_size_increase.description: You can now hold more assets in your hand, giving you more strategic options.

adventurer_health.title: Executive's Stamina
adventurer_health.body: This is the executive's current stamina. If it reaches zero, they suffer a burnout and the Work Day ends.

adventurer_power.title: Executive's Productivity
adventurer_power.body:
This is the executive's productivity level. It affects how effectively they handle encounters.
  • Higher productivity is better
  • Can be increased by corporate assets

adventurer_flow_state.title: Engagement Level
adventurer_flow_state.body:
The executive's mental state. This is affected by the difficulty of their tasks.

If they experience too much Lethargy or Imminent Burnout, they might quit.

multiple_units.title: Team Members
multiple_units.body: Stats apply to each individual member in this department.

log_messages.info_adventurer_declines_offer: Disappointed by your offers, {name} decides to take nothing.
log_messages.info_easy_fight: An easy meeting. Too trivial for synergy...
log_messages.info_great_battle: A productive negotiation! Quarterly results look excellent!
log_messages.info_too_close_for_comfort: That was a close call. Almost needed to call HR.
log_messages.info_adventurer_fell: {name} suffered a fatal burnout on Floor {room} of Work Day {run}.
log_messages.info_adventurer_bored: {name} became lethargic on Floor {room} of Work Day {run}, and quit.
log_messages.info_adventurer_apathy: {name} started quiet quitting on Floor {room} of Work Day {run}, and left the company.
log_messages.info_empty_hand: {name} waits for your decision, unaware that the budget has been frozen.
log_messages.info_welcome_to_workshop: Welcome back. Spend your Expense Funds wisely.
log_messages.info_trap_room: {name} ran into the {trapName} and lost {damage} stamina.
log_messages.info_no_more_rooms: {name} reached the end of the floor plan (without a performance review).
log_messages.info_enemy_defeated: A hostile department member has been synergized with.
log_messages.info_workshop_not_unlocked: The workshop is not unlocked yet. Starting a new run.
log_messages.info_flow_state_changed: {name}'s state of mind changed from {from} to {to}.
log_messages.info_repetitive_choice: {name} feels a sense of repetitiveness from seeing {itemName} again.
log_messages.info_deja_vu: {name} feels a sense of deja vu upon entering {roomName}.
log_messages.warn_empty_hand: The Executive was hoping for new assets, but the budget is frozen.
